data.eml:eml: Two new species of Portanini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Aphrodinae) from Southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Felix, Márcio, Mejdalani, Gabriel (2016): Two new species of Portanini (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Aphrodinae) from Southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4196 (3): 399-406, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4196.3.3
